name: 3D Santa's Sleigh Racing
description:
3D Santa's Sleigh Racing - Sleigh Down Hill Avoiding Black Flags and Collecting Abandoned Candy Canes and Red Flags. Try and Sleigh Without Collecting Penalties. How Fast Can You Complete Circuit? 7 Dashboard Clocks Show Stats. Shows Last Lap Time. Control to Move Left and Right. Up Control to Accelerate. Down Control to Reverse. New: Stunt Jumps Through Hoops of Fire. Rival Sleighs on the Attack. New Christmas Soundtrack - Added Jumps! New: Rival Sleighs on the Attack. New: Stunt Jumps Through Hoops of Fire. New: Fun Soundtrack.

• Sleigh Down Hill Avoiding Black Flags and Collecting Candy Canes.
• Keep off Grass Verges to Avoid Penalties.
• How Fast Can You Complete Circuit?
• 7 Dashboard Clocks Show Stats. Shows Last Lap Time.

Please Rate*************************
